articles.author: Danyal Khan
articles.title: Joe Cole says Chelsea have found their own Kevin De Bruyne to give them Champions League edge - Football.London
articles.description: The former Chelsea midfielder has been discussing the Blues' European chances as their trophy defence gets underway against Zenit Saint Petersburg
articles.content: Former Chelsea midfielder and BT Sport pundit Joe Cole has tipped Chelsea for Champions League success once again and has pinpointed Romelu Lukaku as the man to help the Blues win their third Europea… [+3955 chars]
